tools.name: CycloneDX Core for Java
tools.description: Java library for creating, parsing, and validating CycloneDX SBOMs.

tools.name: CycloneDX for .NET
tools.description: Generates CycloneDX Software Bill of Materials (SBOM) from .NET projects.

tools.name: CycloneDX Libraries for .NET
tools.description: .NET libraries to consume and produce CycloneDX Software Bill of Materials (SBOM).

tools.name: CycloneDX JavaScript Library
tools.description: Core functionality of CycloneDX for JavaScript (Node.js or Web Browser) written in TypeScript.

tools.name: CycloneDX for Node.js
tools.description: This is a so-called meta-package, it does not ship any own functionality, but it is a collection of optional dependencies with one purpose in common: generate CycloneDX Software-Bill-of-Materials (SBOM) from node-based projects.

tools.name: CycloneDX for NPM
tools.description: Create CycloneDX Software Bill of Materials (SBOM) from npm projects.

tools.name: CycloneDX for Yarn
tools.description: Create CycloneDX Software Bill of Materials (SBOM) from yarn projects.

tools.name: CycloneDX for Webpack
tools.description: Webpack plugin that generates CycloneDX Software Bill of Materials (SBOM) for JavaScript/TypeScript bundles during the build process.

tools.name: CycloneDX for Maven
tools.description: Apache Maven plugin that automatically generates CycloneDX SBOMs (JSON or XML) for Java projects and can attach vulnerability disclosure information.

tools.name: CycloneDX library for Go
tools.description: Go library that can parse, create and serialize CycloneDX Software Bill of Materials (SBOM) in JSON or XML.

tools.name: CycloneDX for Go modules
tools.description: Command-line utility and Go library that generates CycloneDX SBOMs from Go modules, binaries and applications.

tools.name: CycloneDX for Gradle
tools.description: Gradle plugin that generates CycloneDX SBOMs (XML or JSON) for all dependencies in Java-based builds.

tools.name: CycloneDX for PHP Composer
tools.description: Create CycloneDX Software Bill of Materials (SBOM) from PHP Composer projects.

tools.name: CycloneDX PHP Library
tools.description: PHP library that supplies data-models, serializers, validators and utilities for creating, parsing and validating CycloneDX BOM documents in JSON and XML formats.

tools.name: CycloneDX for Python
tools.description: Generates CycloneDX SBOMs from Python (virtual) environments, requirement files, and manifests (Poetry, PipEnv, etc)

tools.name: CycloneDX Python Library
tools.description: This Python package provides data models, validators and more, to help you create/render/read CycloneDX documents.

tools.name: CycloneDX for Ruby Gems
tools.description: Command-line utility and Ruby library that generates CycloneDX SBOMs for Ruby projects by analysing Gem dependencies.

tools.name: CycloneDX for Rust Cargo
tools.description: Cargo sub-command and CLI library that generates CycloneDX SBOMs for Rust projects, aggregating all crate dependencies and outputting JSON or XML.

tools.name: CycloneDX for SBT (Scala)
tools.description: SBT plugin that generates CycloneDX SBOMs (JSON or XML) for Scala/Java builds, supporting schema v1.6 and integrating smoothly with Dependency-Track.

tools.name: CycloneDX for Erlang/Elixir (Mix)
tools.description: Mix task that generates CycloneDX SBOMs for Erlang/Elixir projects, exporting XML or JSON and supporting multiple CycloneDX schema versions.

tools.name: CycloneDX for Erlang/Elixir (Rebar3)
tools.description: Rebar3 plug-in that generates CycloneDX SBOMs for Erlang/Elixir projects, exporting XML or JSON and supporting CycloneDX v1.4.

tools.name: CycloneDX for Go
tools.description: Command-line utility and Go library that generates CycloneDX SBOMs from Go module projects for supply-chain transparency.

tools.name: CycloneDX for Bower
tools.description: Creates CycloneDX Software Bill of Materials (SBOM) from JavaScript projects that manage dependencies with Bower.

tools.name: cdxgen
tools.description: Universal polyglot CLI, library and server that generates CycloneDX SBOMs—including SaaSBOM, OBOM and CBOM variants—for source code, container images and cloud resources.

tools.name: CycloneDX-Buildroot
tools.description: Python application that generates CycloneDX Software Bill of Materials (SBOM) for Buildroot-generated projects and other projects with CSV manifest files

tools.name: Eclipse SW360 Antenna
tools.description: Archived tool that scanned project artifacts, downloaded sources for dependencies, validated licenses, and generated license compliance documentation

tools.name: CycloneDX Node.js Generate SBOM
tools.description: GitHub Action to create a CycloneDX Software Bill-of-Materials (SBOM) for Node.js projects containing an aggregate of all project dependencies. (note: considered deprecated)

tools.name: CycloneDX .NET Generate SBOM
tools.description: GitHub Action to create a CycloneDX Software Bill-of-Materials (SBOM) for .NET projects supporting multiple project formats and recursive analysis

tools.name: CycloneDX PHP Composer Generate SBOM
tools.description: GitHub Action to create a CycloneDX Software Bill-of-Materials (SBOM) for PHP Composer projects (note: considered deprecated)

tools.name: CycloneDX Python Generate SBOM
tools.description: GitHub Action to create a CycloneDX Software Bill-of-Materials (SBOM) for Python projects from requirements files (note: considered deprecated)

tools.name: Generate SBoM for Elixir project
tools.description: GitHub Action to generate CycloneDX Software Bill-of-Materials (SBOM) for Erlang/Elixir Mix projects

tools.name: OSS Review Toolkit (ORT)
tools.description: A comprehensive suite of tools to automate software compliance checks, analyze dependencies / vulnerabilities, and generate reports.

tools.name: Retire.js
tools.description: Scanner that detects the use of JavaScript libraries with known vulnerabilities in web and Node.js applications and can generate CycloneDX-format SBOMs.

tools.name: Dependency-Track
tools.description: An intelligent Component Analysis platform that allows organizations to identify and reduce risk in the software supply chain by leveraging SBOMs

tools.name: Dependency-Track Jenkins Plugin
tools.description: Jenkins plugin that publishes CycloneDX Software Bill-of-Materials (SBOM) to the Dependency-Track platform for vulnerability analysis and policy evaluation

tools.name: Dependency-Track Maven Plugin
tools.description: Maven plugin that integrates with a Dependency-Track server to submit SBOMs and optionally fail execution when vulnerable dependencies are found

tools.name: dtrack-audit
tools.description: Command-line client for OWASP Dependency-Track that publishes SBOMs and displays vulnerability information from the command line, designed for CI/CD integration

tools.name: ShiftLeft Scan
tools.description: A free open-source security tool for modern DevOps teams that performs static analysis-based security testing across multiple languages and frameworks

tools.name: SCANOSS
tools.description: Open source software identification and inventory tool that provides insights into license compliance, security vulnerabilities, and software composition analysis

tools.name: oss_inventory
tools.description: A tool to import CycloneDX BOMs and visualize open source software statistics for dependency analysis and reporting

tools.name: Auditjs
tools.description: Audits JavaScript projects to identify known vulnerabilities and outdated package versions using the OSS Index v3 REST API

tools.name: Chelsea
tools.description: Dependency vulnerability auditor for Ruby

tools.name: Jake
tools.description: An OSS Index integration to check your Conda environments for vulnerable Open Source packages

tools.name: Nancy
tools.description: A tool to check for vulnerabilities in your Golang dependencies, powered by Sonatype OSS Index

tools.name: Go Sonatypes
tools.description: Common utility packages for working with OSS Index, Nexus IQ Server, CycloneDX SBOMs or getting a user-agent

tools.name: Valaa Stack
tools.description: SBoMDoc is a VDoc extension which uses CycloneDX namespaces and can emit BOM documents in various formats

tools.name: Nexus IQ
tools.description: Software Composition Analysis (SCA) platform that can consume, analyze, and produce CycloneDX SBOMs

tools.name: Nexus Lifecycle Jenkins Plugin
tools.description: Publishes CycloneDX SBOMs to Nexus IQ for per-build analysis, result visualization, and policy evaluation

tools.name: MedScan
tools.description: Consumes SBOMs to help hospitals manage medical device assets, providing vulnerability and resource analysis for compliance and risk management.

tools.name: Reliza Hub
tools.description: Publishes and ingests SBOMs for metadata management, compliance, and distribution. Supports CycloneDX and SPDX standards for software supply chain transparency.

tools.name: SwiftBOM
tools.description: Generates SBOMs for demo and PoC purposes. Supports output in CycloneDX, SPDX, and SWID formats. Visualizes SBOMs as tree graphs.

tools.name: DtrackAuditor
tools.description: Python CLI tool to upload CycloneDX SBOMs to Dependency-Track, analyze vulnerabilities, enforce policy, and fail CI builds based on thresholds.

tools.name: Syft
tools.description: CLI tool and library for generating a Software Bill of Materials from container images and filesystems.

tools.name: Grype
tools.description: A vulnerability scanner for container images and filesystems. Works with Syft SBOMs and supports CycloneDX, SPDX, and OpenVEX.

tools.name: CycloneDX CLI
tools.description: CLI tool for SBOM analysis, merging, diffs, format conversions, signing, and validation. Supports CycloneDX XML/JSON/Protobuf/CSV, SPDX JSON, and more.

tools.name: CycloneDX Web Tool
tools.description: Web-based tool for validating, viewing, and converting CycloneDX SBOMs. Supports XML/JSON, and conversion between CycloneDX and SPDX formats.

tools.name: CycloneDX Rust
tools.description: Simple Rust library to encode and decode CycloneDX BOMs.

tools.name: CycloneDX for Cocoapods
tools.description: Creates CycloneDX SBOMs for Objective-C and Swift projects that use CocoaPods.

tools.name: mdbom
tools.description: A simple command line tool to transform CycloneDX SBoMs to markdown.

tools.name: OpenRewrite
tools.description: Open-source automated refactoring ecosystem for code transformation, security remediation, and dependency management through reusable recipes and build tool plugins.

tools.name: Defect Dojo
tools.description: Open source vulnerability management and automation platform that can import CycloneDX SBOMs and over 190 security tool reports for centralized vulnerability tracking and analysis.

tools.name: OSS Inventory
tools.description: A web application for importing, storing, and visualizing CycloneDX SBOMs, allowing organizations to track software components across projects.

tools.name: Fortress File Integrity Assurance
tools.description: A proprietary software analysis tool that validates patches and ensures software file integrity to enhance software supply chain security in critical infrastructure environments.

tools.name: Fortress Asset 2 Vendor
tools.description: Comprehensive cyber supply chain risk management platform that ingests, analyzes and securely shares SBOMs, HBOMs and other supply chain attestations via SaaS and permissioned blockchain.

tools.name: Software Assurance Guardian Point Man
tools.description: A patented tool that performs comprehensive software supply chain risk assessments using a 7-step process to detect vulnerabilities and calculate trustworthiness scores for software.

tools.name: Cybeats SBOM Studio
tools.description: Enterprise solution to manage SBOMs at scale and proactively discover and reduce risk across the entire software supply chain, from development through deployment.

tools.name: TrustSource
tools.description: SaaS platform for implementing and maintaining open source compliance that imports CycloneDX SBOMs, analyzes them for licenses and vulnerabilities, and integrates with various development workflows.

tools.name: JDisc Discovery
tools.description: Network discovery and IT inventory tool that can discover CycloneDX SBOMs on enterprise assets and ingest component inventory into the platform.

tools.name: PulseUno Plugin for Dimensions CM
tools.description: PulseUno enables development teams to continually build and inspect the health and quality of code using plugins such as CycloneDX. Teams can use this information for merge, deployment, and release decisions.

tools.name: CycloneDX GoMod Generate SBOM
tools.description: GitHub action which generates CycloneDX SBOMs from Go modules, providing integration into CI/CD workflows for Go projects.

tools.name: BOM Repository Server
tools.description: A lightweight repository server used to publish, manage, and distribute CycloneDX SBOMs.

tools.name: ittosai
tools.description: ittosai is a CycloneDX SBOM vulnerability analyzer that analyzes SBOMs every time a developer commits code to a repository.

tools.name: CodeSentry
tools.description: Software Composition Analysis (SCA) platform that leverages binary analysis to identify components, inherited risk, and communicates inventory through CycloneDX SBOMs

tools.name: Heimdall
tools.description: Automatically extract or manually upload your Software Bill of Materials (SBOM), and Heimdall will, on a continual basis, identify known vulnerabilities affecting your software components

tools.name: Contrast Security
tools.description: Automatically generates component inventory from runtime analysis (IAST or RASP) and generates CycloneDX SBOMs

tools.name: Salus
tools.description: Salus is a tool for coordinating the execution of security scanners. Salus can generate CycloneDX SBOMs from many language ecosystems.

tools.name: Codenotary vcn
tools.description: Protects an organization's software development pipeline from supply chain attacks. Codenotary natively supports CycloneDX SBOMs.

tools.name: CodeNotary CAS
tools.description: CAS is an open source attestation service for the community. Notarize and authorize files, directories, git repos and Build SBOMs of containers.

tools.name: Codenotary CAS Notarize Docker Image and SBOM
tools.description: A GitHub Action which notarizes and creates an SBOM for Docker images.

tools.name: Codenotary CAS Authenticate Docker Image and SBOM
tools.description: A GitHub Action which authenticates notarized Docker images and SBOMs.

tools.name: Cosign
tools.description: Container Signing, Verification and Storage in an OCI registry, including CycloneDX SBOMs

tools.name: Tern
tools.description: Software composition analysis tool that generates a Software Bill of Materials for container images and Dockerfiles

tools.name: Cybellum SBOM
tools.description: Analyzes binary artifacts to generate SBOMs including context-based analysis to perform accurate vulnerability assessment

tools.name: Scancode Toolkit
tools.description: Detects licenses, copyrights, package manifests & dependencies by scanning code to discover and inventory open source and third-party packages

tools.name: swift-package-sbom-generator
tools.description: A software bill of materials (SBOM) generator for Swift packages

tools.name: SRC:CLR SBOM Generator
tools.description: Generates a Software Bill of Materials in CycloneDX JSON Format from Veracode SCA Agent results

tools.name: NowSecure Platform
tools.description: Mobile application security testing solution that automates static, dynamic and interactive testing, with SBOM capabilities through GitHub integrations

tools.name: Ion Channel Platform
tools.description: Risk management platform that enables analysis, exchange and continuous monitoring of Software Bills of Materials (SBOMs) to actively manage third party risk and compliance

tools.name: CycloneDX for Conan1
tools.description: Creates CycloneDX Software Bill of Materials (SBOM) for C/C++ projects using Conan1 (note: considered deprecated)

tools.name: CycloneDX for Conan2
tools.description: Creates CycloneDX Software Bill of Materials (SBOM) for C/C++ projects using Conan2

tools.name: Checkov
tools.description: Prevent cloud misconfigurations during build-time for Terraform, Cloudformation, Kubernetes, Serverless framework and other infrastructure-as-code-languages with Checkov by Bridgecrew. Can output to CycloneDX.

tools.name: SBOM CLI
tools.description: Creates CycloneDX SBOMs from Kubernetes Helm charts

tools.name: CxSCA
tools.description: Software Composition Analysis (SCA) platform that identifies vulnerabilities, malicious code, and license risks in open-source libraries with exploitable path analysis and SBOM generation capabilities.

tools.name: Ochrona CLI
tools.description: A command line tool for detecting vulnerabilities in Python dependencies and doing safe package installs. Outputs CycloneDX SBOMs and supports policy enforcement.

tools.name: pip-audit
tools.description: Audits Python environments and dependency trees for known vulnerabilities and can emit CycloneDX SBOMs of affected components.

tools.name: RKVST SBOM Hub
tools.description: Free SaaS repository to discover, store and permission-share CycloneDX v1.4 SBOMs with immutable provenance, VEX support and continuous assurance.

tools.name: WpBom
tools.description: WordPress plugin that generates CycloneDX SBOMs for installed plugins and themes, and can automatically submit them to OWASP Dependency-Track for vulnerability analysis.

tools.name: Meterian BOSS scanner
tools.description: Software composition analysis that inventories codebases and produces CycloneDX SBOMs while detecting security and licence risks across 12+ ecosystems.

tools.name: Spack
tools.description: HPC package manager for Linux and macOS; the spack-sbom plug-in exports CycloneDX SBOMs for any concretized spec.

tools.name: build-info-go
tools.description: Open-source Go library and CLI that captures build metadata and outputs CycloneDX SBOMs for Java, Node.js, .NET, Go, Python and more.

tools.name: Kyverno
tools.description: Kyverno is an open-source Kubernetes policy engine that validates, mutates and generates configurations, and can evaluate CycloneDX SBOM attestations to enforce supply-chain policies.

tools.name: jbom
tools.description: jbom generates runtime and static CycloneDX SBOMs for local or remote Java applications and archives.

tools.name: KICS
tools.description: KICS scans Infrastructure-as-Code to detect security vulnerabilities, compliance issues and misconfigurations, exporting results as CycloneDX SBOM and VDR reports.

tools.name: Xray
tools.description: JFrog Xray is a software-composition-analysis platform that finds vulnerabilities, license issues and policy violations in open-source and third-party components, and can export CycloneDX SBOMs with optional VEX data.

tools.name: apt2sbom
tools.description: Python tool that builds a Software Bill of Materials (SBOM) from APT and Python package information on Ubuntu systems, with CLI and HTTP interfaces.

tools.name: NetRise Platform
tools.description: The NetRise Platform generates SBOMs for binary code and post-build artifacts. It can ingest and analyze 3rd party SBOMs and provide guidance on risk mitigation, including CVEs, hardcoded credentials, cryptographic risk, and misconfigured services.

tools.name: Rebom
tools.description: Open source catalog for storing, managing, and distributing CycloneDX Software Bills of Materials (SBOMs) in JSON format, with features for validation, merging, and analysis.

tools.name: cve-bin-tool
tools.description: Command-line scanner that identifies vulnerable components in binaries, accepts/generates SBOMs, and reports CVEs. Supports 400+ checkers for open source libraries with CycloneDX output.

tools.name: Jetstack Secure
tools.description: Manages machine identities across Cloud Native Kubernetes and OpenShift environments, providing a detailed view of enterprise security posture for TLS certificates and PKI.

tools.name: Keysight IoT Security Assessment
tools.description: Automated firmware analysis platform that generates SBOMs and identifies vulnerabilities, misconfigurations, hardcoded credentials, weak cryptography, and potential zero-day vulnerabilities in IoT devices.

tools.name: Ko
tools.description: Simple, fast container image builder for Go applications that generates CycloneDX SBOMs by default, supports multi-platform builds, and integrates seamlessly with Kubernetes.

tools.name: Sonatype Lift
tools.description: Cloud-native, collaborative code analysis platform that analyzes pull requests to find and fix security, performance, reliability, and style issues while generating CycloneDX SBOMs.

tools.name: spdxcyclone
tools.description: Java utility that converts Software Bill of Materials (SBOM) documents from CycloneDX format to SPDX format, supporting multiple serialization options for both standards.

tools.name: Trivy
tools.description: Comprehensive security scanner for containers, filesystems, Git repositories, VMs and Kubernetes that detects vulnerabilities, misconfigurations, secrets and generates CycloneDX SBOMs.

tools.name: Apiiro
tools.description: Application Security Posture Management (ASPM) platform that proactively identifies and remediates critical risks in cloud-native applications across the software supply chain.

tools.name: Gemnasium
tools.description: Dependency scanning analyzer that uses the GitLab Advisory Database to detect vulnerabilities in project dependencies and generates CycloneDX SBOMs.

tools.name: Lagoon Insights Handler
tools.description: Component that processes CycloneDX SBOMs and container image metadata for Lagoon environments, with vulnerability analysis via Trivy integration and customizable data filtering.

tools.name: SnykVulnCheck
tools.description: Command-line tool that analyzes CycloneDX SBOMs and evaluates components for known vulnerabilities by querying the public Snyk Vulnerability Database API.

tools.name: apko
tools.description: Build OCI images using APK directly without Dockerfile. Generates CycloneDX SBOMs for containers using native SBOM functionality in apk-tools v3.0 and higher.

tools.name: OSV
tools.description: Open source vulnerability database and scanner that accepts CycloneDX SBOMs as input and identifies known vulnerabilities in components across multiple ecosystems.

tools.name: docker-sbom-cli-plugin
tools.description: Docker CLI plugin that generates Software Bills of Materials (SBOMs) for container images using Syft as the underlying scanner, with CycloneDX output support.

tools.name: ThreatMapper
tools.description: Deepfence ThreatMapper hunts for vulnerabilities in production platforms, ranks vulnerabilities based on their risk-of-exploit using attack path enumeration, and generates CycloneDX SBOMs.

tools.name: JupiterOne
tools.description: Easily identify, map, analyze, and secure cyber assets and attack surface. Gain full visibility into complex cloud environments to uncover threats, close compliance gaps, and prioritize risk.

tools.name: Veracode
tools.description: API to output SBOM in CycloneDX (JSON) format based on Veracode's software composition analysis (SCA) scan.

tools.name: Tidelift
tools.description: Tidelift provides a managed open-source subscription that delivers commercial support, maintenance, security and license assurances for the open-source dependencies used to build applications, backed directly by project maintainers.

tools.name: Bytesafe
tools.description: Bytesafe is a dependency firewall and SCA platform that blocks malicious packages, scans for vulnerabilities, enforces license policies, and generates CycloneDX SBOMs to secure the software supply chain.

tools.name: KubeClarity
tools.description: Open-source platform (CLI, UI & Helm chart) that generates SBOMs, converts them between CycloneDX/SPDX formats, and scans container images, directories and running Kubernetes clusters for vulnerabilities, licences and CIS Docker benchmark findings.

tools.name: Flawnter
tools.description: Flawnter is a zero-trust static, dynamic and composition analysis platform that detects code flaws, vulnerabilities and license risks, and generates CycloneDX/SPDX SBOMs during every scan.

tools.name: SonarQube
tools.description: SonarQube allows developers and development teams to write clean code and remediate existing code organically, so they can focus on the work they love and maximize the value they generate for businesses.

tools.name: Black Duck
tools.description: Black Duck is Synopsys’ SCA platform that generates CycloneDX/SPDX SBOMs, detects open-source vulnerabilities, and automates license and policy compliance across applications, containers and CI/CD pipelines.

tools.name: SBOM-Operator
tools.description: Catalogue all container images running in a Kubernetes cluster and publish Software Bill of Materials (SBOM) documents, generated with Syft, to multiple back-ends.

tools.name: yasca (Yet Another SCA tool)
tools.description: Yasca (Yet Another SCA tool) is an open-source Python utility and GitHub Action that scans Maven projects against GitHub Security Advisories, detects vulnerable or outdated dependencies, and exports CycloneDX SBOMs.

tools.name: Rezilion Dynamic SBOM
tools.description: Continuous, runtime-aware SBOM platform that inventories every file, package and dependency across Windows and Linux hosts, containers and CI/CD pipelines, exports CycloneDX/VEX and validates vulnerability exploitability in real time.

tools.name: BlackBerry Jarvis
tools.description: Software composition analysis (SCA) and security testing solution that detects and lists open-source software and licenses in embedded systems and their cybersecurity vulnerabilities and exposures.

tools.name: Fortify Software Security Center
tools.description: Open-source CycloneDX parser plugin for Fortify SSC that imports SBOMs, correlates components with known vulnerabilities and licenses, and displays them in the SSC portal.

tools.name: sbom-submission-action
tools.description: GitHub Action that uploads CycloneDX SBOM files to GitHub’s dependency submission API, enabling Dependabot security analysis downstream.

tools.name: Vexy
tools.description: Generate VEX (Vulnerability Exploitability Exchange) CycloneDX documents.

tools.name: Project Piper
tools.description: Project Piper is an open-source Jenkins shared library and CLI that automates SAP-centric CI/CD pipelines and can generate CycloneDX SBOMs for Maven, Python, Go, container, and other builds.

tools.name: action-owasp-dependecy-track-check
tools.description: GitHub Action that builds a CycloneDX SBOM for Node.js, Python, Go, Ruby, Java, .NET and PHP projects, converts it to v1.2 when necessary, and uploads it to an OWASP Dependency-Track server for automatic vulnerability analysis.

tools.name: LicenseComplianceTool
tools.description: Creates license manifests from CycloneDX SBOMs. Provides a Jenkins build step and CLI to list third-party components, their licenses, and download license texts to aid open-source compliance.

tools.name: sbom-action
tools.description: GitHub Action that fetches and diffs CycloneDX SBOMs for container images, posting comments or opening pull requests when package or vulnerability changes are detected.

tools.name: DaggerBoard
tools.description: Vulnerability-scanning application that ingests CycloneDX or SPDX SBOM files, analyses listed dependencies for known CVEs, and presents results through a web dashboard.

tools.name: gobom
tools.description: An extensible CycloneDX BOM generator and Dependency-Track API client written in Go; supports Go, npm, CocoaPods and Gradle projects and uploads SBOMs for analysis.

tools.name: sca-codeinsight-reports-cyclonedx
tools.description: Generates CycloneDX SBOM reports (XML and JSON) for projects scanned in Flexera Code Insight.

tools.name: meta-dependencytrack
tools.description: meta-dependencytrack is a Yocto meta-layer which produces a CycloneDX Software Bill of Materials (aka SBOM) from your root filesystem and then uploads it to a Dependency-Track server against the project of your choice

tools.name: Mend SCA
tools.description: Mend SCA provides software composition analysis that scans direct and transitive open-source dependencies, enforces security and license policies, and exports CycloneDX or SPDX SBOMs with optional VEX data.

tools.name: Prisma Cloud
tools.description: Unified cloud-native application protection platform that scans code, pipelines, infrastructure and runtime to generate CycloneDX SBOMs, analyze vulnerabilities, licenses and misconfigurations, and secure entitlements across multi-cloud environments.

tools.name: CAST Highlight
tools.description: CAST Highlight automatically analyzes source code portfolios for open-source risks, cloud readiness, resiliency, green impact and technical debt, and can import CycloneDX SBOMs for instant SCA insights.

tools.name: CAST SBOM Manager
tools.description: CAST SBOM Manager automates creation, customization and maintenance of SBOMs, adds vulnerability and license insights, and exports them in CycloneDX, Excel and Word with a free tier up to 25 SBOMs.

tools.name: Kondukto
tools.description: Application Security Orchestration and Correlation platform that generates and consumes CycloneDX or SPDX SBOMs, correlates vulnerability scanner findings, and automates remediation workflows across CI/CD pipelines.

tools.name: Enso
tools.description: Application Security Posture Management (ASPM) platform that inventories software assets, tracks AppSec tools and processes, and outputs CycloneDX and SPDX SBOMs with optional VEX ingest.

tools.name: Tally
tools.description: Command-line tool that adds OpenSSF Scorecard security posture scores to packages listed in CycloneDX SBOMs.

tools.name: SecureStack
tools.description: SecureStack analyzes your application and finds all source code, cloud stack and third-party services and builds a CycloneDX SBOM every time you deploy

tools.name: SBOM Insights
tools.description: SBOM Insights is a subscription-based SaaS platform that ingests SBOMs in CycloneDX and SPDX formats, reconciles and analyzes components for vulnerabilities, license compliance and outdated parts, and generates reports and compliance artifacts.

tools.name: EMBA
tools.description: EMBA is an open-source firmware security analyzer that extracts firmware, performs static and dynamic analysis, builds CycloneDX SBOMs with VEX data, and generates detailed vulnerability reports.

tools.name: Spectra Assure
tools.description: Spectra Assure scans binary software packages, container images, and VM disk images to detect malware, tampering, vulnerabilities, and other exposures. CycloneDX SBOM, SaaSBOM, ML-BOM, and CBOM are outputs.

tools.name: Arsenal
tools.description: Free online toolset that builds AI-powered SBOMs and SaaSBOMs for COTS, OSS, code repos and container images, then analyzes vulnerabilities, licenses and outdated components to surface software-supply-chain risk.

tools.name: Fortify on Demand
tools.description: SaaS application-security testing platform offering SAST, DAST and SCA. Produces and consumes CycloneDX SBOMs to secure the software supply chain across many languages, frameworks and package managers.

tools.name: SBOMDiff
tools.description: SBOMDiff is an Apache-2.0 CLI that compares two SBOM files (CycloneDX 1.4 or SPDX 2.3), highlighting package additions, removals, version or license changes, and outputs text, JSON or YAML reports.

tools.name: SBOM4Python
tools.description: CLI utility that produces CycloneDX or SPDX SBOMs for installed Python modules or requirements files, identifying dependencies and their licenses, with optional dependency graph output.

tools.name: SBOM4Files
tools.description: Command-line tool that scans a directory and generates CycloneDX (JSON) or SPDX SBOMs for its files.

tools.name: SBOM4Rust
tools.description: CLI that reads Cargo.lock and authors CycloneDX v1.6 or SPDX SBOMs for Rust projects.

tools.name: Distro2SBOM
tools.description: A command line tool which creates CycloneDX and SPDX SBOMs for an installed application or distribution (Debian, RPM, Windows and FreeBSD systems supported).

tools.name: SBOM-Manager
tools.description: SBOM-Manager is an open-source Python CLI that stores, queries, and scans CycloneDX 1.4/1.5 and SPDX 2.3 SBOMs via a local repository to support audit and vulnerability investigations.

tools.name: SBOMAudit
tools.description: SBOMAudit is a command-line utility that audits CycloneDX or SPDX SBOMs against NTIA minimum requirements, license policies, allow/deny lists, and package age to flag outdated or non-compliant components.

tools.name: SBOM2doc
tools.description: SBOM2doc converts CycloneDX or SPDX SBOMs into human-readable reports in PDF, Markdown, HTML, Excel or console formats via a cross-platform Python CLI.

tools.name: SBOM2dot
tools.description: CLI that reads CycloneDX or SPDX SBOMs and emits a GraphViz-compatible DOT file so you can visualise component and dependency relationships.

tools.name: SBOMMerge
tools.description: Command-line utility that merges two SBOM files, supporting CycloneDX and SPDX inputs and outputs in tag, JSON or YAML formats.

tools.name: Lib4sbom
tools.description: Python library that parses, converts and generates SBOMs in CycloneDX and SPDX formats, allowing JSON, Tag, YAML and XML serialization and programmatic manipulation of packages, files and dependencies.

tools.name: bomber
tools.description: CLI scanner that analyses CycloneDX, SPDX or Syft SBOMs for security vulnerabilities and licence issues using OSV, Sonatype OSS Index, GitHub Advisory or Snyk providers.

tools.name: Covenant
tools.description: Command-line tool that creates SBOMs from .NET and NPM projects or existing CycloneDX BOMs, outputting CycloneDX or SPDX formats.

tools.name: ONEKEY firmware analysis platform
tools.description: Cloud-based platform that automatically extracts firmware images, enumerates components, and produces CycloneDX SBOM and vulnerability reports.

tools.name: Vuls
tools.description: Agent-less vulnerability scanner for Linux, FreeBSD, containers, WordPress, programming language libraries and network devices which outputs CycloneDX Vulnerability Disclosure Reports (VDR).

tools.name: StackAware
tools.description: StackAware is a SaaS platform for managing CycloneDX 1.4/1.5 and SPDX SBOMs, enriching them with VEX data, and securely distributing both SBOMs and SaaSBOMs for supply-chain risk analysis.

tools.name: Manifest
tools.description: Manifest is a subscription SBOM management platform that auto-generates, aggregates, enriches, analyzes, and securely shares CycloneDX or SPDX SBOMs via web app and GitHub Action integration.

tools.name: Valint
tools.description: CLI and CI/CD tool for generating CycloneDX SBOMs, signing and verifying supply-chain evidence, enforcing policy, and tracking vulnerabilities across containers, source repositories, and pipelines.

tools.name: Debricked
tools.description: Debricked lets teams automatically find, fix and prevent open-source vulnerabilities, avoid non-compliant licences and pick healthier dependencies, with CycloneDX SBOM import/export, CLI and SaaS dashboards.

tools.name: EXPLIoT IoT Security Assessment Framework
tools.description: EXPLIoT is an AGPLv3 Python framework and CLI for assessing and exploiting IoT devices; it offers 140+ plug-ins and can generate CycloneDX SBOMs from firmware filesystems.

tools.name: Endor Labs
tools.description: Cloud-native platform that auto-creates CycloneDX SBOMs, generates VEX, and analyzes reachability so teams can securely select, integrate and maintain open-source software at scale.

tools.name: Value Stream Management (VSM)
tools.description: SaaS catalog that ingests CycloneDX SBOMs via REST API, indexes them by team and product, and surfaces vulnerabilities, licenses and component age to secure the software supply chain.

tools.name: RapidFort
tools.description: Container-optimization platform that scans, profiles and hardens images, generates SBOMs, converts to CycloneDX/SPDX, and exports VEX to prioritize exploitable CVEs.

tools.name: FOSSA
tools.description: Subscription SCA platform and CLI that generate, import, analyse, and distribute CycloneDX or SPDX SBOMs for licence and vulnerability risk management across CI/CD pipelines.

tools.name: SBOM Quality Score
tools.description: Command-line utility that evaluates the quality and compliance of CycloneDX and SPDX SBOMs across multiple categories, enabling automated policy gates in CI/CD workflows.

tools.name: SBOM Grep
tools.description: Command-line utility (`sbomgr`) that performs grep-style searches across SBOMs by name, checksum, CPE, and PURL.

tools.name: SBOM Explorer
tools.description: sbomex is a command line utility to help query and pull from Interlynk's public SBOM repository.

tools.name: SBOM Benchmark
tools.description: SBOM Benchmark is an Apache-licensed web application that scores CycloneDX 1.4/1.5 and SPDX SBOMs for quality and compliance, generating shareable reports via the sbomqs engine.

tools.name: Amazon Inspector SBOM Generator
tools.description: Amazon Inspector SBOM Generator (inspector-sbomgen) outputs CycloneDX 1.4 or SPDX 2.3 SBOMs for archives, container images, directories, local systems, and Go/Rust binaries, providing metadata for vulnerability scans with the Inspector ScanSBOM API.

tools.name: Xygeni Software Supply-Chain Security
tools.description: Supply-chain security platform and CLI that generates CycloneDX SBOMs, analyses vulnerabilities and misconfigurations, enforces policy in CI/CD, and integrates with DevOps tools to secure releases.

tools.name: SBOM Utility (sbom-utility)
tools.description: Go-based CLI and API to validate, query, trim and patch CycloneDX or SPDX BOMs, report on components, licences and vulnerabilities, and handle all CycloneDX variants up to v1.6.

tools.name: License Scanner
tools.description: license-scanner is an Apache-2.0 Go library and CLI that detects SPDX-style licenses and legal terms in source files and outputs CycloneDX v1.4 SBOMs with detailed license data.

tools.name: gh-sbom
tools.description: CLI extension for the gh tool that generates CycloneDX or SPDX JSON SBOMs for any GitHub repository using Dependency Graph data.

tools.name: SecObserve
tools.description: Open-source platform that aggregates findings and CycloneDX SBOMs from many scanners, lets teams assess security and license risks, and reports results via dashboards and APIs.

tools.name: Vulert Vulnerability Scanner
tools.description: Web SCA service that analyzes CycloneDX or SPDX SBOMs (or lockfiles) to flag open-source vulnerabilities and license issues, sending real-time alerts without requiring code access or signup.

tools.name: Vigiles
tools.description: Vulnerability monitoring and remediation suite that imports, generates, converts, and analyses CycloneDX or SPDX SBOMs with curated CVE feeds and build-system integrations for Yocto, Buildroot, OpenWrt, and more.

tools.name: Arnica
tools.description: SaaS platform that automates software supply-chain security; offers free, always-up-to-date SBOM generation in CycloneDX format plus risk analysis and CI/CD integrations.

tools.name: Technolinator
tools.description: GitHub App that generates CycloneDX SBOMs with cdxgen, scans them for vulnerabilities using grype, and uploads results to Dependency-Track.

tools.name: FACT
tools.description: The aDolus FACT platform is an advanced aggregation, analytics, and correlation engine that generates NTIA-compliant SBOMs (including CycloneDX) and provides continuous cybersecurity risk intelligence across the software supply chain.

tools.name: Parlay
tools.description: Parlay is an Apache-licensed CLI written in Go that takes CycloneDX 1.4 JSON/XML or SPDX 2.3 SBOMs and enriches them with licence, vulnerability, maintainer and scorecard data from services like ecosyste.ms, Snyk and OpenSSF.

tools.name: Beniva Software Bill of Materials (SBOM)
tools.description: Beniva SBOM allows you to consume CycloneDX SBOM and Vulnerability Exploitability eXchange (VEX) within the ServiceNow platform which increases visibility of vulnerabilities and reduces time to remediate.

tools.name: bombon
tools.description: CLI and Nix library that generates CycloneDX v1.5 SBOMs for Nix packages, including build-time and vendored dependencies, compliant with BSI TR-03183 and US EO 14028.

tools.name: Continuous Clearing
tools.description: Scans third-party OSS components in NPM, NuGet, Maven, Python and Debian projects, generates CycloneDX SBOMs, then uploads them to SW360 and Fossology for automated license clearing.

tools.name: CaPyCli - Clearing Automation for SW360
tools.description: CaPyCli is an MIT-licensed Python CLI that generates, compares, merges and converts CycloneDX SBOMs for several language ecosystems and maps them to a SW360 component database.

tools.name: cyclonedx-editor-validator
tools.description: Command-line utility to create, merge, edit and validate CycloneDX SBOMs and VEX files for automated CI/CD workflows.

tools.name: vsm-sbom-booster
tools.description: CLI and Docker-based tool that scans Git providers, runs ORT, generates CycloneDX SBOMs centrally, and uploads them to LeanIX VSM to speed onboarding.

tools.name: asdf-cyclonedx
tools.description: asdf plugin that installs and manages CycloneDX CLI versions, enabling SBOM tooling in any asdf-managed environment.

tools.name: cdx-central
tools.description: CLI utility that downloads public CycloneDX SBOMs from Maven Central for selected artifacts.

tools.name: cdx-vs-cdx
tools.description: GTK-style Python GUI that compares two CycloneDX JSON SBOMs, highlighting components unique to each file and those present in both.

tools.name: cyclonedx-npm-pipe
tools.description: Bitbucket Pipe that packages cdxgen in a Docker image to generate CycloneDX v1.6 SBOMs for Node.js/npm projects in CI pipelines.

tools.name: macaron
tools.description: Macaron is a supply chain security analysis tool and policy engine that checks conformance to frameworks such as SLSA, integrating CycloneDX SBOM generators or consuming existing SBOMs for automated analysis of build integrity and dependencies.

tools.name: kbom - Kubernetes Bill of Materials powered by KSOC
tools.description: kbom is an open-source CLI tool from KSOC, written in Go, that generates detailed CycloneDX SBOMs for Kubernetes clusters, including nodes, control plane, OS, and cloud infrastructure details.

tools.name: SBOM Scorecard
tools.description: SBOM Scorecard evaluates SBOMs for specification compliance, generation metadata, and package details, supporting CycloneDX, SPDX, and Syft formats.

tools.name: SBOM Observer
tools.description: SBOM Observer provides a comprehensive SBOM workflow to help you manage your software supply chain. Leverage the powerful combination of the Policy Engine and Operational Model to guarantee the security and compliance of your software.

tools.name: SBOM Assembler
tools.description: sbomasm is a command-line tool that assembles product SBOMs from component SBOMs, supporting CycloneDX and SPDX formats for streamlined management and distribution.

tools.name: Neo4Cyclone
tools.description: Neo4Cyclone is a tool that allows you to visualise your SBOMs using Neo4J.

tools.name: SBOMcenter
tools.description: SBOMcenter.io is a free service to get insights into the ingredients of your software for free and without any software.

tools.name: SBOM.sh
tools.description: SBOM.sh is a free service to store, visualize and globally share CycloneDX SBOM files by simply using HTTP requests or curl.

tools.name: Vulnerabilities.io
tools.description: Generates CycloneDX Software Bill of Materials (SBOM) and visualizations for an organization's codebase through integrations with source control systems. Enables organizations to manage overall supply chain risk.

tools.name: Athena
tools.description: Athena is a SaaS solution for medical device makers that overlays the product development lifecycle to address risks before devices go to market.

tools.name: Semgrep
tools.description: Semgrep is an application security platform where developers can scan for vulnerabilities in code (SAST), in OSS dependencies (SCA), and secrets. Semgrep creates CycloneDX SBOMs that enrich vulnerabilities with reachability analysis.

tools.name: sbom-swissarmy-bitbucket-pipe
tools.description: A Bitbucket Pipe containing a collection of open source tools to perform additional analysis on a CycloneDX or SPDX SBOM.

tools.name: cyclonedx-merge
tools.description: Tool to merge CycloneDX files (JSON/XML) with support for normal, flat, and smart merge modes.

tools.name: cyclonedx-enrich
tools.description: Enrich CycloneDX SBOM files by applying enrichers to improve data quality, including licenses, hashes, properties, and references.

tools.name: sbom-rs
tools.description: A group of Rust projects for interacting with and producing software bill of materials (SBOMs).

tools.name: MLBOMdoc
tools.description: A command line tool which produces a human-readable representation of a CycloneDX ML Bill of Materials (MLBOM). Output formats include PDF and Markdown.

tools.name: SBOMTrend
tools.description: A command line tool which analyses a set of SBOMs to identify license and version changes in components.

tools.name: Oligo Runtime SBOM
tools.description: Oligo Security delivers instant insights into actively executed libraries, assessing open source risks and confirming exploitability. It enables CycloneDX SBOM creation and auto-generates VEX.

tools.name: bogrod
tools.description: A command line tool to manage SBOM and VEX like source code and to distribute SBOMs to notaries.

tools.name: ARIANNA
tools.description: SBOM, HBOM and vulnerability management platform for intelligent connect devices. Show compliance to regulations and standards and manage risk across the entire product lifecycle.

tools.name: SBOM Vendor Management
tools.description: Manage, assess, store and monitor all your vendor’s SBOMs in one secure, centralized dashboard to improve supply chain security.

tools.name: Rollup Plugin SBOM
tools.description: Creates CycloneDX SBOMs for frontend Javascript apps bundled with rollup or vite.

tools.name: Product Security Hub (PSH)
tools.description: Cloud-based tool to import, export, view, create, edit, and transform CycloneDX SBOMs and human-readable SBOMs, as well as manage VEX data.

tools.name: Surfactant
tools.description: A modular framework for extracting file information and relationships for filesystems, with an SBOM as the primary output.

tools.name: Chainloop
tools.description: Chainloop is an Open Source evidence store for your Software Supply Chain attestations, SBOMs, VEX, QA reports, and more.

tools.name: Threatrix
tools.description: Threatrix CodeCertify platform provides a solution for producing a comprehensive and accurate, singular, CycloneDX bill of materials from multiple sources.

tools.name: cyclonedx_deps_to_mermaid.xsl
tools.description: Extensible Stylesheet Language Transformations (XSLT) to translate CycloneDX dependency graph to mermaid chart.

tools.name: cdx-enrich
tools.description: Enriches a CycloneDX Software Bills of Material (SBOM) with predefined data.

tools.name: Meta Package Manager
tools.description: Export a SBOM of all packages installed on a Linux, macOS or Windows system.

tools.name: BOMSkope
tools.description: BOMSkope is a Software Bill of Materials manager designed to streamline the tracking of vendor components. It enables the identification and monitoring of vulnerabilities in vendor software, enhancing visibility into your overall security posture.

tools.name: CVE Scan
tools.description: Detect and mitigate vulnerabilities in embedded systems. Generate SBOMs, cross-reference public databases, integrate with CI pipelines, and use filtering/annotations for streamlined security maintenance.

tools.name: nim_lk
tools.description: Create and update SBOMs for the Nim programing language. Includes a translation module for the Nimble package manager as well as a Nix expression for building packages from SBOMs.

tools.name: Bitbucket Pipe for SBOM Generation
tools.description: Integrate this Bitbucket Pipe into your CI/CD pipeline to automatically generate a Software Bill of Materials (SBOM) for any project.

tools.name: Sonar Cryptography Plugin
tools.description: A SonarQube Plugin that detects cryptographic assets in source code and generates CBOM.

tools.name: CBOM Viewer
tools.description: A Web Service to visualize and explore the use of cryptography in software with Cryptography Bills of Materials (CBOM).

tools.name: CBOMkit
tools.description: CBOMkit is a toolset for generating, viewing, checking, and storing Cryptography Bills of Materials (CBOM).

tools.name: CBOMkit-theia
tools.description: A tool that detects cryptographic assets in container images and directories, generating CBOMs.

tools.name: Cyberwatch
tools.description: Cyberwatch Vulnerability Manager allows you to discover assets, scan and prioritize vulnerabilities, and fix them.

tools.name: sbomify
tools.description: sbomify is a comprehensive SBOM management platform that enables secure sharing and analysis of Software Bill of Materials. Seamlessly integrates with CI/CD pipelines.

tools.name: Sunshine
tools.description: Open-source SBOM visualization tool. Converts CycloneDX JSON into interactive charts and tables for components, dependencies, vulnerabilities, and licenses.

tools.name: SOOS
tools.description: Automate your software inventory. SOOS creates, ingests, and manages your Software Bill of Materials and uses patented SCA and the largest open-source SBOM database to find hidden vulnerabilities, license issues, and dependencies sooner.

tools.name: Noma
tools.description: AI Application Security Platform for the entire AI lifecycle, focusing on AI asset discovery, ML-BOM, and AI supply chain risk management.

tools.name: RunSafe C/C++ Build-time SBOM Generator
tools.description: Generates a C/C++ SBOM at build-time without a package manager, working across build environments and reporting on all library dependencies.

tools.name: ts-scan
tools.description: Multi ecosystem SCA cli tool supporting SBOM generation, decoration and analysis for licenses, vulnerabilities, known code snippets and malware.

tools.name: sbom-validator
tools.description: A lightweight Go library for validating Software Bill of Materials (SBOM) against industry-standard specifications.

tools.name: CycloneDX Perl Library
tools.description: Perl library for generating CycloneDX SBOMs.

tools.name: ReARM
tools.description: ReARM is a system to store, organize and manage SBOMs / xBOMs with Component and Product releases.

tools.name: BOMnipotent
tools.description: A server application for managing and distributing SBOMs and CSAF documents. Integrates with tools for vulnerability scanning.

tools.name: AI SBOM Generator
tools.description: Generate AI SBOM (AIBOM, AI/ML-BOM) in CycloneDX format for models on Hugging Face.

tools.name: ProCap360
tools.description: An advanced SBOM, RBOM and AIBOM  cybersecurity risk management tool using novel knowledge graph technology to enhance software supply chain security and visually display real time application assurance.

tools.name: SonarQube Advanced Security
tools.description: Secure your entire codebase—first-party, third-party, and everything in between. Seamlessly integrated into your workflow, SonarQube detects and fixes vulnerabilities, ensures license compliance, and generates Software Bills of Materials

tools.name: Hermeto
tools.description: Hermeto is a CLI tool that pre-fetches your project's dependencies, which enables network-isolated builds, which enables the production of high-accuracy SBOMs

tools.name: ClickBOM
tools.description: Downloads and merges SBOMs from various sources. Convert to CycloneDX and SPDX formats. Upload to cloud storage and ClickHouse for analytics.
